ps.ptxt: Lock-up control solenoid valve circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Shift solenoid valve No.1 and/or No.2 circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Transmission fluid temperature sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for opnen, short and intermittent referring to DTC P0335: Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Circuit (For M16 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .

ps.ptxt: Accelerator pedal position sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent referring to DTC P0122: Throttle Position Sensor (Main) Circuit Low:For Petrol Engine Model , DTC P0123: Throttle Position Sensor (Main) Circuit High:For Petrol Engine Model , DTC P0222: Throttle Position Sensor (Sub) Circuit Low:For Petrol Engine Model and DTC P0223: Throttle Position Sensor (Sub) Circuit High:For Petrol Engine Model .
Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
